===Etymology===
Schuessler (2007) compared this word with Proto-Monic *''[ʔ]məp'' ("good tasting, have a pleasant flavour, be pleasant") > {{cog|mnw|မိပ်|tr=mìp||to be happy, to enjoy}}. Unger (1992) connects this with {{cog|bo|བྲོད}} (< {{m|bo|བྲོ||to taste}}). Also compare {{etyl|ko|-}} {{ko-l|맛|mas|taste}} / {{ko-l|멋|mes|taste; charm}}.
